item.title: The Mighty Monad
item.description: When you begin to learn functional programming everybody is telling you that pure functions with no side effects are the only way to go. This is fine up to the point. Sooner or later you will hear about monads. This post tries to explain what the monad is and why you should use it. Prerequisites To fully understand the examples here you should know at least basics of Scala language.
